data.title: Who Represents Me?
data.meta_description: Find out who represents you in the city, county, state, and country.
data.text:
City Representatives

Grand Prairie residents are represented at the city level by city council members. The Grand Prairie City Council is made up of six council members who represent six council districts; two council members represent the city "at large;" and a mayor also represents the city at large.

Find your city council members

County Representatives

Areas of the city of Grand Prairie are located within Dallas County, Tarrant County, and Ellis County.

Texas County elected officials include County Judge, County Commissioner, District and County Attorney, District and County Clerk, Sheriff, Tax Assessor-Collector, County Treasurer, Justice of the Peace, Constable and County Auditor.

Contact your county for more information on these elected officials.

Find your county

State and National Representatives

Information about state and national government representatives is available from the State of Texas.
